memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &meshName, float lengthX, float lengthY, float lengthZ)
memberdef.name: GenerateAxes

briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a reference Axes; Use red for x-axis, green for y-axis, blue for z-axis Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.

parameterdescription.para: - x-axis should start at -lengthX / 2 and end at lengthX / 2
- y-axis should start at -lengthY / 2 and end at lengthY / 2
- z-axis should start at -lengthZ / 2 and end at lengthZ / 2

simplesect.para: Pointer to mesh storing VBO/IBO of reference axes

briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a quad; Use random color for each vertex Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.

simplesect.para: Pointer to mesh storing VBO/IBO of quad

briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a cube; Use random color for each vertex Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.

simplesect.para: Pointer to mesh storing VBO/IBO of cube

briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a quad; Use random color for each vertex Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.
